PATIENT_ID: TEST_ORGAN_SSI_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-15 14:00:00
Patient underwent surgery for exploratory laparotomy.
Operative procedure performed for penetrating abdominal trauma.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-05 10:00:00
Patient re-presented within 30 days of procedure.
CT abdomen shows intra-abdominal abscess in left upper quadrant.
Peritonitis suspected based on clinical findings.
Organism identified from aseptically obtained fluid culture positive for E. coli.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-05 09:00:00
CT abdomen/pelvis: Fluid collection in left upper quadrant suspicious for abscess.
Imaging consistent with abscess measuring 4.2 x 3.1 cm.
